content: This is relevant to a conversation we were having somewhere about virtual coffee breaks and breakout rooms (which I can't find now). I was just informed that the just-released Zoom client (version ≥\geq≥ 5.3.2 or something like that) has built in support for breakout rooms as a new feature
Absolutely, we use it all the time in the Statebox Category Theory courses. Still, it's suboptimal I believe
OWLS had been using breakout rooms since March at least :thinking:
